name: Guide Me Through the Dark
description:
Escape from the underground ruins with the help of a small creature

 

Controls:

WASD = Move

Q = Switch Characters

R = Follow Human Character

E = Interact

M = Restart Level

Music

"Ancient Ruins" by Ted Kerr licensed CC-BY 3.0

https://opengameart.org/content/ancient-ruins

This is actually my first (finished) solo project. Made in 7 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2
